description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国山东省的县。
description.en: A county in Shandong Province, China.

description.zh-cn: 秦和珍早年就读的师范学校。
description.en: The normal school that Qin Hezhen attended in his early years.

description.zh-cn: 指20世纪30年代至40年代，中国抵抗大日本帝国侵略的全面战争。
description.en: Refers to the full-scale war of resistance fought by China against the invasion of the Empire of Japan in the 1930s and 1940s.

nodes.id: 第五战区第二抗日游击纵队

zh-cn: 第五战区第二抗日游击纵队

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间由秦和珍组织的抗日武装力量。
description.en: An anti-Japanese armed force organized by Qin Hezhen during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

nodes.id: 人民抗日义勇队第二总队第十三大队

zh-cn: 人民抗日义勇队第二总队第十三大队

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间由秦和珍组织的抗日武装力量，后改编为八路军115师苏鲁豫支队一部。
description.en: An anti-Japanese armed force organized by Qin Hezhen during the Second Sino-Japanese War, later reorganized into part of the Sulu-Yu Detachment of the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army.

nodes.id: 国民革命军第十八集团军

zh-cn: 国民革命军第十八集团军

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期，由中国共产党领导的常规军队。
description.en: The main regular army force led by the Communist Party of China during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

nodes.id: 国民革命军第十八集团军第115师

zh-cn: 国民革命军第十八集团军第115师
en: 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军第十八集团军（八路军）下属的三个主力师之一。
description.en: One of the three main divisions of the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 八路军115师的下属部队。
description.en: A subordinate unit of the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在金乡县的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Jixiang County.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在湖西地区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in the Huxi region.

description.zh-cn: 冀鲁豫边区的行政机构。
description.en: An administrative body in the Hebei-Shandong-Henan Border Region.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争结束后，中国国民党与中国共产党之间爆发的内战。
description.en: The civil war fought between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China after the end of the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 冀鲁豫边区的行政机构。
description.en: An administrative body in the Hebei-Shandong-Henan Border Region.

description.zh-cn: 冀鲁豫边区的行政机构。
description.en: An administrative body in the Hebei-Shandong-Henan Border Region.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在鲁中南地区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in the Luzhongnan region.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的社会主义国家，由中国共产党执政。
description.en: A socialist state in East Asia governed by the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央在山东省设立的派出机构。
description.en: A dispatched agency of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China in Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省的省级国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level state administrative organ of Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在山东省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在惠民地区的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in the Huimin region.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在济南市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Jinan City.

description.zh-cn: 山东省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing committee of the Shandong Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 秦和珍出生于山东省金乡县鱼山乡秦庄村。
description.en: Qin Hezhen was born in Qin Village, Yushan Township, Jixiang County, Shandong Province.

description.zh-cn: 秦和珍早年考入滋阳乡村师范学校。
description.en: Qin Hezhen was admitted to Ziyang Rural Normal School in his early years.

relationships.target: 第五战区第二抗日游击纵队

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，秦和珍组织了第五战区第二抗日游击纵队。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, Qin Hezhen organized the Second Anti-Japanese Guerrilla Column of the Fifth War Zone.

relationships.target: 人民抗日义勇队第二总队第十三大队

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间，秦和珍组织了人民抗日义勇队第二总队第十三大队。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, Qin Hezhen organized the 13th Battalion of the Second General Corps of the People's Anti-Japanese Volunteer Army.

relationships.source: 人民抗日义勇队第二总队第十三大队

description.zh-cn: 1939年，人民抗日义勇队第二总队第十三大队被改编为八路军115师苏鲁豫支队第四大队。
description.en: In 1939, the 13th Battalion of the Second General Corps of the People's Anti-Japanese Volunteer Army was reorganized into the 4th Battalion of the Sulu-Yu Detachment, 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army.

position.en: Political Instructor of the 1st Company, 1st Battalion

description.zh-cn: 在其部队被改编后，秦和珍担任苏鲁豫支队第四大队一营一连指导员。
description.en: After his unit was reorganized, Qin Hezhen served as the political instructor of the 1st Company, 1st Battalion, 4th Brigade of the Sulu-Yu Detachment.

relationships.target: 国民革命军第十八集团军第115师

description.zh-cn: 苏鲁豫支队是八路军115师的下属部队。
description.en: The Sulu-Yu Detachment was a subordinate unit of the 115th Division of the Eighth Route Army.

relationships.source: 国民革命军第十八集团军第115师
relationships.target: 国民革命军第十八集团军

description.zh-cn: 115师是八路军（国民革命军第十八集团军）的主力师之一。
description.en: The 115th Division was one of the main divisions of the Eighth Route Army (18th Group Army of the National Revolutionary Army).

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战期间担任此职务。
description.en: Held this position during the Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战期间，曾任冀鲁豫二专署副专员、专员。
description.en: During the Chinese Civil War, served as Deputy Commissioner and then Commissioner of the Second Special Administrative Office of the Hebei-Shandong-Henan region.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后，担任中共中央山东分局组织部副部长、部长。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, he served as Deputy Head and then Head of the Organization Department of the Shandong Sub-bureau of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1956年任中共山东省第一届委员会委员。
description.en: In 1956, he became a member of the first Shandong Provincial Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 1977年升任中共山东省委书记后，兼任山东省人民政府副省长。
description.en: After being promoted to Secretary of the CPC Shandong Provincial Committee in 1977, he also served as Vice Governor of Shandong Province.
